reuters.title: GM <GM> CANADA SETS ONE-WEEK LAYOFF
reuters.body: General Motors of Canada Ltd, a unit of General Motors Corp, said about 1,600 hourly-rated employees at the Oshawa plant will be laid off for one week due to high inventories. The workers affected produce the Oldsmobile Ciera and Pontiac 6000 models, a spokesman said. Reuter 
